descriptors.description: Demonstrates how to use the SDIO Slave interface on the SI91x SoC device.

descriptors.label: SI91x - SoC USART Master Example
descriptors.description: This example project configures USART in Master Mode and transmits and receives data in full duplex mode.

descriptors.name: usart_slave_soc
descriptors.label: SI91x - SoC USART Slave Example
descriptors.description: This example project configures USART in Slave Mode and transmits and receives data in full duplex mode(when master generates clock).

descriptors.description: demostrate analog_comparator functionality .

descriptors.label: SI91x - SoC BOD
descriptors.description: Demonstrates how to use BOD when the supply voltage is less than the BOD threshold .

descriptors.label: SI91x - SoC DAC FIFO
descriptors.description: demonstrates the DAC functionality in FIFO mode .

descriptors.description: demonstrates the DAC functionality in static mode .

descriptors.name: opamp_soc
descriptors.label: SI91x - SoC Opamp
descriptors.description: demonstrates about Unity Gain Buffer or Voltage follower by giving input .

descriptors.name: qei_soc

descriptors.description: demonstrates the velocity,position count,index count and direction measurement .

descriptors.name: rtc_soc

descriptors.description: Demonstrates the how to configure the Real Time Clock (RTC) in SiLabs MCU chip .

descriptors.description: demonstrates how to use Capacitive touch sensor in Si917 chip .

descriptors.description: Demonstrates the WDT warning trigger interrupt handler .
